import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link, NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import Modal from "../../pages/Modal"; import Register from "../../pages/Modal/component/register"; // import { createPortal } from "react-dom"; export default function HeaderContent() { let [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); function menuClick(left, overlay, visible) { //Open or Close document.querySelector(".nav").style.left = left; document.querySelector(".nav").style.position = "fixed"; document.querySelector(".overlay_nav").style.position = "fixed"; document.querySelector(".overlay_nav").style.opacity = overlay; document.querySelector(".overlay_nav").style.visibility = visible; setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen); } //Modal let [open, setOpen] = useState("close"); function registerModal(open) { setOpen(open); document.getElementById("root").style.position = open === "open" ? "fixed" : "initial"; } const closeModalStyle = { color: "black", position: "absolute", right: "30%", }; console.log(open); return ( <>
!isMenuOpen ? menuClick("320px", 0.8, "visible") : menuClick("0", 0, "hidden") } >
menu
